title: Remove Expired Products from Shelf
description: A grocery store associate is checking for expired items in the dairy section.

tasks.description: Visually inspect the 'sell-by' dates on all milk products.
tasks.expected_outcome: The associate identifies several cartons that are past their sell-by date.

tasks.description: Remove the expired cartons from the shelf.
tasks.expected_outcome: The expired product is no longer available for sale.

tasks.description: Scan the items and process them as 'waste' or 'shrink' in the inventory system to correctly adjust the on-hand levels.
tasks.expected_outcome: The inventory is accurately adjusted to reflect the removal of the expired product.
